title: IMF Wraps Up 2024 Article IV Talks With Bahamas

title: The Bahamas Achieves Major Fiscal Progress, Strengthening its Position as a Stable and Sustainable Financial Partner
description: NASSAU, The Bahamas, Oct. 13, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The Office of the Prime Minister last week announced that The Bahamas achieved a significant fiscal milestone, recording a 0.5% fiscal deficit for the budget year ending June 30, 2025. title: CAF approves USD 100 million loan to reform energy sector in Bahamas
description: CAF, development bank of Latin America and the Caribbean, approved a US$100 million loan to support energy sector reform in the Bahamas.
